#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>

main()
{
      int m,n,i;
      scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
      int arr[m],arr1[n];
      int s1=0,s2=0;
      for(i=0;i<m;i++)
      {scanf("%d",&arr[i]);s1+=arr[i];}
      for(i=0;i<n;i++)
      {scanf("%d",&arr1[i]);s2+=arr1[i];}
      int res;
      int add=(s1&1)^(s2&1);
      if(s1>s2)
      res=s2+add+(s1-s2)/2;
      else
      res=s1+add+(s2-s1)/2;
      printf("%d\n",res);
}
